content: Hi @Michel Rutten when I tried to import US core patient profile, an error is getting displayed as in the below screenshot forgeerror.PNG. How can it be fixed? Thank you

Hi @Pranitha Sruthi, Where did you get the profile from?
I can open the profiles published on hl7.org and Simplifier without any issues:
http://www.hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition-us-core-patient.xml
https://simplifier.net/US-Core/patient
I suggest you compare the online versions with your own local version to figure out what's wrong.
Or manually download to disk, then open from there. That should work.
@Michel Rutten Ok the US core profile available on Simplifier.net got imported on forge with out any error. Thank you
